question: It is absolutely true fact that people cannot imagine their lives without music. It totally interferes in each sphere of human life. What are the most popular styles today?
text: The bar graph elaborated by the magazine Silicon Valley Insider gives information about the percentage of people aged 16-29 and 30+ who use four types or devices for reading: Desktop/laptop, e-reader, mobile phone and tablet. This research is based on 166 people aged 16-29 and 621 people aged 30+.

Overall, it can be seen that, most people aged 16-29 read throughout desktops or laptops (55%), while most people aged 30+ prefer e-readers to desktops or laptops with 46% and 38% respectively. In contrast with, only 23% of people aged 16-29 read e-readers and 25% of those ages 30+ read through mobile phones.

Cell phones and tablets are the third and the fourth popular devices that people aged 16-29 use in reading with 41% and 16%, respectively, whereas those aged 30+ prefer to read throughout cell phones and tablet at almost the same percentage with 25% and just over 25% respectively.
